name: lot-management-system
description: Lot Management System - Unified Task Runner

scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d db
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec db psql -U admin -d lot_management
scripts.db:shell:test: docker compose exec db-test psql -U testuser -d lot_management_test
scripts.be:lint: docker compose exec -T backend ruff check app/
scripts.be:lint:fix: docker compose exec -T backend ruff check app/ --fix
scripts.be:format: docker compose exec -T backend ruff format app/
scripts.be:typecheck: docker compose exec -T backend mypy app/
scripts.be:test: docker compose exec -e TEST_DB_PRE_INITIALIZED=true -T backend uv run pytest -v
scripts.be:test:integration: docker compose exec -T backend pytest tests/integration -v
scripts.be:quality: npm run be:lint:fix && npm run be:format && npm run be:typecheck && npm run be:test:quick
scripts.be:ci: npm run be:lint && npm run be:format && npm run be:typecheck && npm run be:test
scripts.fe:lint: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run lint
scripts.fe:lint:fix: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run lint:fix
scripts.fe:format: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run format
scripts.fe:format:check: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run format:check
scripts.fe:typecheck: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run typecheck
scripts.fe:check:circular: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run check:circular
scripts.fe:typegen: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run typegen:curl
scripts.fe:test: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run test:run
scripts.fe:test:e2e: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run test:e2e
scripts.fe:test:e2e:smoke: docker compose exec -T frontend npm run test:e2e:smoke
scripts.fe:quality: npm run fe:lint:fix && npm run fe:format && npm run fe:typecheck && npm run fe:test
scripts.fe:ci: npm run fe:lint && npm run fe:format:check && npm run fe:typecheck && npm run fe:test
scripts.alembic:upgrade: docker compose exec -T backend alembic upgrade head
scripts.alembic:downgrade: docker compose exec -T backend alembic downgrade -1
scripts.alembic:history: docker compose exec -T backend alembic history
scripts.alembic:current: docker compose exec -T backend alembic current
scripts.lint: npm run be:lint && npm run fe:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run be:lint:fix && npm run fe:lint:fix
scripts.format: npm run be:format && npm run fe:format
scripts.typecheck: npm run be:typecheck && npm run fe:typecheck
scripts.test: npm run be:test && npm run fe:test
scripts.test:quick: npm run be:test:quick && npm run fe:test
scripts.quality: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run typecheck && npm run test:quick
scripts.quality:full: npm run quality && npm run test:smoke
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.ci:smoke: npm run ci && npm run test:smoke
scripts.dev:setup: npm run up && sleep 10 && npm run db:init
scripts.dev:reset: npm run db:reset && sleep 5 && npm run alembic:upgrade && npm run db:init
